Ref: When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the configuration profile ID.

GetAtt.Description: The Amazon Resource Name of the AWS Key Management Service key to encrypt new configuration  data versions in the AWS AppConfig hosted configuration store. This attribute is only  used for hosted configuration types. To encrypt data managed in other  configuration stores, see the documentation for how to specify an AWS KMS key  for that particular service.
